scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cd server && pip3 install poetry-plugin-export poetry && python3 -m poetry add psycopg2-binary^2.9.9 flask^1.1 werkzeug^1 Flask-JWT-Extended^4.3.1 flask-sqlalchemy^2.5.1 SQLAlchemy=1.4.52 flask-limiter^1.5 jinja2=3.0.3 itsdangerous=2.0.1 && python3 -m poetry export -f requirements.txt --output requirements.txt && pip3 uninstall -y poetry-plugin-export poetry && mv requirements.txt .. && cd .. && mkdir -p dist && cd frontend && yarn install && yarn build && cd .. && rm -rf frontend && cp -r server/app/templates/* dist
